title: [Self-directed] Diabetes Foot Care: Online Practice-Centered Educational Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and fundamental understanding of diabetes management
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Nursing and Healthcare Students. Combines Online Platforms with Offline Practical Training

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain clinical guidelines for preventing diabetic foot complications with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can identify high-risk patients using foot ulcer assessment tools with 90% accuracy
Through constructivist learning activities, learners can propose ≥3 improvement plans for diabetic foot care protocols
Learners achieve critical thinking skills through peer review in online forums based on a 4-level evaluation scale
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
